document.discussion_title: Body found in Ollerton confirmed as Stan Shanks
document.topic_text: Body found in Ollerton confirmed as Stan Shanks May 10, 2016 The body of a man found in Ollerton on Friday 6 May 2016 is that of Stan Shanks. Stan, 78, had been missing for seven days. Stan's son Terry released the following statement on behalf of his family: "To the people of Ollerton, we would like to say a big, big thankyou for your help and support. "Stan was loved by all his family and friends and he will be sadly missed." The family has asked that media respect their privacy at this time. Neighbourhood:
